testsuite.name: webTestCases.Module2_Login

testcase.name: tc004_VerifyLoginWithValidCredentials
testcase.system-out: Chrome browser launched Browser maximized Navigated to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/ Implicit wait set to 5 seconds Register Link is displayed Clicked on LogIn Link Welcome Text is displayed Entered mkar@gmail.com into Email TextField Entered Ka@12345 into Password TextField Clicked on Login button Logout Link is displayed

testcase.name: tc005_VerifyLoginWithInValidCredentials
testcase.system-out: Firefox browser launched Browser maximized Navigated to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/ Implicit wait set to 5 seconds Register Link is displayed Clicked on LogIn Link Welcome Text is displayed Entered mkar@gmail.com into Email TextField Entered Ka@123456 into Password TextField Clicked on Login button Incorrect credentials Msg is displayed

testcase.name: tc006_VerifyLoginWithNoCredentials
testcase.system-out: Edge browser launched Browser maximized Navigated to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/ Implicit wait set to 5 seconds Register Link is displayed Clicked on LogIn Link Welcome Text is displayed Clicked on Login button No account found Msg is displayed
